website_summaries.verdict: A basic, pure acetone nail polish remover that quickly removes even the toughest gel polish, though it can be drying on skin and cuticles.
pros: Pure acetone formula removes gel polish easily, without extensive scrubbing or scraping
Can be used to remove regular nail polish as well
cons: Some find that this product dries out cuticles

customer_reviews.title: Not pure. Has denaturing chem
customer_reviews.text: Claims pure acetone, 100%. Has denaturing chemical called denatonium benzoate
customer_reviews.author: Aaron West

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine, I'm sure, but the packaging is terrible. The inner bag had a pool of acetone in it and the outer box was saturated. Not only is it unsafe to ship a product like this, but I lost product I paid money for. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but packaging should be better.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, but disappointed by the packaging. I lost a good bit of the product because the lid twisted open a tad during shipment. Wish I would have gotten a full bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... money because I prefer the SNS nails and I hate that I had to pay extra to take them ...
customer_reviews.text: This has saved me a lot of money because I prefer the SNS nails and I hate that I had to pay extra to take them off but with this acetone I'm able to soak them off so easily at home!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Curtis Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love this Acetone for my nails!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Acetone for my nails. It takes off my 3 week of old nail polish so easily! I also do my own gel nails and this works better than the professional acetone! I have tried to go organic but those are not as strong and I have to spend so much time rubbing and rubbing until my hand gets tired. With this I don't have to spend so much time rubbing. Defintely the best Acetone I have purchased. I would highly recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Kimura

customer_reviews.title: Instantly hardens super glue!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw a video of a model builder using nail polish acetone to make the parts he was gluing together bond instantly just by holding the part above the open container. The fumes apparently cause a chemical reaction. ( i would suggest using this stuff in a open area or with a fan blowing so you do not get light headed ) When gluing larger areas, you will nen to apply a light coating on one side then quickly put together. If you require more time then use a epoxy. Has earned 5 shiny gold stars!
customer_reviews.author: DagDerNiT

customer_reviews.title: 14oz?
customer_reviews.text: Bottle is misshapen. Thought maybe the bottle needed air but it's stuck this way. Not a big deal to me but thought I would share with you all in case it matters to you. It also looks like it's missing some acetone. Picture shows how much is in there.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Did work for me
customer_reviews.text: well, I was just looking for a acetone that will remove the polish off my nail and it failed. I followed the instructions and didn’t work. I tried it a couple of times and all it did was dried up my hand so badly. The acetone from the dollar story works better in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for acetone! Our chain drug store built a smaller building and anything to do with fingernails was one section they did away with. I love that I can order this product and have it delivered free with Amazon prime so I don't have to make a long trip to another drug store. At the price, I ordered 2 & they were packaged well & didn't leak which was something I was worried about. The last thing you'd want is acetone all over anything else you ordered. They were packaged separately from other items I purchased & individually wrapped in the box. Having just got into DIY nails, I know that I will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Herring

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say I love nail polish remover so didn't give 5 stars - oh what the heck... this is great stuff to remove gel nail polish. I soak my nails in it for 10 - 15 minutes the night before I go to the salon, while watching tv, so I don't have to sit doing nothing at the salon. I get in and out of the salon much faster. Fyi, the best way to use this is to first gently file the gel polish with an emory board to get the very top off, then pour some of this acetone in to a small bowl and soak your nails.
customer_reviews.author: TripleD

customer_reviews.title: Just receive it and was leaking
customer_reviews.text: I just received the package but it was leaking and I lost a part of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Fake, fake, fake, this was just delivered today I had on gel polish, it didn't even get any thing off. Am so disappointed right now
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure I don't want to know what's in that stuff but it removes nail polish quickly and is great also for removing gel nails and dipped nails.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Preston

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited to have found pure acetone. Since the pandemic, I haven't gone into a nail shop for a while. And it will most likely be that way for a while longer. However, I enjoy using dip powder to protect my nails. Using regular grocery store acetone did not remove the dip from my nails. But this product did! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t drink this
customer_reviews.text: If you leave it in a glass, don’t forget and take a drink thinking it’s water. It tastes terrible.
customer_reviews.author: SadSandwich

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I was spending too much money on powder dip manicures and decided to do them myself at home. Bought this product to remove the "acrylic" dip. I do use a nail "grinder" first to break the seal, then soak my nails with cotton balls soaked in this acetone. Seems to take a bit longer than the salon, but I'm ok with that... I'm saving money! Works great for regular polish as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Corey

customer_reviews.title: Not Salon/Spa grade
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other brands, this acetone takes a lot longer to remove the products. Will not recommend or buy again for salon/spa owners.
customer_reviews.author: CRC

customer_reviews.title: Received partial bottle, not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: Received opened, partial bottle. Not returnable, as is suggested on the product page (see photo).
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for cleaning up your mani.
customer_reviews.text: I always thought that cleaning up my manicures (with a clean up brush) was like splashing your face with water in skincare commercials - sounds great in theory, but in practice it's a total mess - until I replaced my nourishing nail polish remover with this product. Before I had to really scrub at "whoops" spots on my sidewalls to get them up, but this acetone removes mistakes in one swipe. I'll probably stick with the nourishing remover for actually removing the polish as acetone is pretty drying, but I'll always keep some around from now on just for cleanup. My nails have never looked neater.
customer_reviews.author: sebeth204

customer_reviews.title: Not pure has water.
customer_reviews.text: It says pure acetone, it definitely has water in it if that’s what you were wondering. If you were looking for something more pure definitely go to your local hardware store and get a commercial grade.
customer_reviews.author: Ely

customer_reviews.title: Not salon grade! Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly think that this has been repackaged from industrial grade acetone as salon grade acetone. Look at the residue it leaves! Salon grade pure acetone leaves no residue! Take it from a licensed nail tech. Avoid this product!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dobbie

customer_reviews.title: Works great on gel manicures!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on gel manicures! Soak cotton pad well, use nail clamps & leave for 15mins. Scrape the gel gently with a scraping nail tool. Works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Strong product!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say but it’s strong and works well. I needed some to mix in 50/50 with rubbing alcohol to make a gentler nail cleanser for gel application and to dehydrate nail beds before hard gel application. This pure acetone will eat through table wraps so be careful and clean up ASAP if spilled on anything plastic. Works great to get dip nails and acrylic to soak off as well.
customer_reviews.author: Quen Tins

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: The product was only 3/4 full when it arrived today. I was very disappointed knowing that i paid full price for only 3/4 of a product. There is no returning the item because it’s flammable. Aside from this, it’s been a favorite of mine. I do my own manicures at home and for over a year I’ve used this particular polish and gel polish remover. It’s overly drying, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Clean up new smears, too
customer_reviews.text: It removes color fast but smears on all parts of your hands at the same time. So you have to use this acetone all over again now to remove the smears. Don’t use this unless it’s emergency to remove quickly one or two finger nails not the entire ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Mia

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Works well for nail polish not as great for gel polish but with a little elbow grease it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Anna maloit

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I’ve ordered it several times, but the last time I ordered it ...the cap wasn’t on good and it leaked all in the box so the bottle was almost empty when I opened it! I did let Amazon know and I’m waiting to see if it’s corrected...
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kimmons

customer_reviews.title: Easily Removes Glitter Polish!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to easily remove glitter nail polish which as you know if very difficult to remove....this stuff was amazing. It took off every bit of the glitter polish...nothing left stuck to my nails. It makes super quick work of regular polish and I only end up using 1 cotton ball per hand. It does dry out your cuticles a bit, but I only use it once a week and keep cuticle oil on hand to re-hydrate them. I will never go back to regular polish remover. This is the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product the lid was busted and it had leaked all over everything!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Potts

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great with the tool kit I bought for the gel fingernail polish.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: Tiny ass bottle. For the price? Does this thing erase life mistakes as well? LOL more the reason to read descriptions. Amazon played me
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie.cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and does the job! I used them to remove my dip nail gel polish by soaking cotton balls in acetone and wrapping my nails with them in aluminum foil for 20-30 minutes. Smells and gives me a headache but that’s a given!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok product. Have to use a lot to get off polish
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: My second replacement vat. I love this stuff. It chews right through my gel manicures in 10 minutes without needing additional or extended applications. My last vat lasted an eon. I really haven't encountered anything close to the cuticle dryness using this for a soak off as I have with other brands I've tried. It works well so that there's no scraping of my nail plate and outperforms other, more costly options. For conventional polishes it's a quick wipe to remove completely. Snap! Yay.
customer_reviews.author: Girl_stuff

customer_reviews.title: Big bottle
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the real deal. It is strong and gets polish off easily and quickly. I usually only need one cotton swab. It works on acrylics too if you wrap your nail in foil. It’s a big bottle I’ve had it for about a year now and I still have a lot left. Keep away from kids & pets.
customer_reviews.author: Chieko

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this order. It didnt come sealed and looks as if it I Has already been used a bit. Will definitely be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna nudd

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to remove nail polish
customer_reviews.text: I used this to remove my gel nail polish and I would say that it takes more than 30 minutes for me to actually remove the polish. It could be the amount of layer that affects it from removing it fast, but 30min to remove my gel nail polish can dry out my cuticles really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mxchelle

customer_reviews.title: Takes Time to Remove Polish!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this purchase it takes forever to my polish off with this remover. I have purchased better removers than this.
customer_reviews.author: poo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR REMOVING ACRYLIC NAILS
customer_reviews.text: I only put 3 stars for easy to remove b/c we all know that Acrylics are never easy to remove BUT this is the one y’all. Worked great I wish I can put up pictures so y’all can see the process. 1st round I soaked in cotton ball under aluminum foil for 15, two nails came off like magic. 2nd round for 10min (I think if I would have done 15 again my thumb and pinky would have came off much better as well) I just ended up using file for the little bit that was left on my nail
customer_reviews.author: janee'

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, excellent product. Stubborn glitter And darker colors remove easily with Super Nail Pure Acetone. Use sparingly as acetone will also break down skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie K. White

customer_reviews.title: You need this sis
customer_reviews.text: It removes my home Meade jacked up powder dipped nails. It removed it very fast. With this pandemic I’m learning to do things on my own and this is easily top 1 on my favorite list. The shipping was fast and my product was well packaged. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: S V

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but acetone nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: It is pure acetone as far as I could tell & did the job. The outside of the bottle was nasty, with sticky stuff on the outside I had to wipe off. I did not like how the product didn't come with a seal or tamper free plastic on the lid. No way for customer to see if this item has been tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: AngieG

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced big time.
customer_reviews.text: It is acetone but you can buy a gallon at the big box for the same price...or less.
customer_reviews.author: your name

customer_reviews.title: SAVED MY LIFE DURING QUARANTINE!`
customer_reviews.text: Needed a quality acetone for doing nails at home during quarantine but did not want to go out as my husband and I both had the virus. Ordered this and got it in days! Probably the best acetone I have ever purchased! Thank you Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Chaneco

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This works really well you just have to have patience. I have used it to remove my dip powder with tips. It took maybe 30 min but I feel like it would have been shorter if I left my hand to soak for a longer period of time every time.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I guess this bottle was $18 something bc of the pandemic and lack of acetone in drugstores, etc. I was desperate to soak off my dip nails. But what really makes this that much money?!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ament

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’m finally finishing a bottle I purchased back in 2017 (I use it for some general cleaning of glass as well as nails). This was a great purchase, will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ahn O'Maly

customer_reviews.title: ... go through lots of nail polish remover since i love bright neon nail colors but don't like to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: i go through a lot of nail polish remover since i love bright neon nail colors but don't like to wear them at work..it's a huge bottle, is decently priced, and takes off my nail polish, even the glittery ones, quickly and effortlessly...i hate fake nails so im not sure if it's any good for taking off fake nails, but it's great for removing nail polish...the non-acetone stuff they sell at the store just doesn't work...i haven't noticed it drying out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maman Soureh

customer_reviews.title: Take long to remuve the polish
customer_reviews.text: It fulfills his purpose but I feel that the polish is very stuck even after 10 minutes with the acetone set, I do the same procedure as with other brands and I feel that this takes longer.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: It's Acetone... Plain and simple
customer_reviews.text: It's genuine pure Acetone. BE CAREFUL around plastics and fabrics that are artificial. It will disintegrate it. Immediately. Pour alcohol on it to stop the disintegrating. It's ideal for nail use but if you're needing it to clean metal it works too. When using it on your nails, it dries your nails and skin out quickly. Fine price for what you're getting but could be found cheaper for more at some beauty supply places.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail polish remover. Easy to remove the toughest glitter polishes. Works like a charm. Flawless transaction. I highly recommend seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: At least the container isn't a tin can that requires a tool to open
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to review about pure acetone. As far as I can tell, this is good stuff, and I'm glad they've researched an appropriate container that is not one of those metal paint thinner cans because those are annoying to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great value bottle of acetone
customer_reviews.text: This is pure acetone and gets the job done just like any other acetone does. That being said I would recommend these, as they are one of the cheapest options and are a great value
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Roeun

customer_reviews.title: Works great on dipping powder
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! I put it on cotton and wrap my nails and after about 10 mine the dipping powder comes right off. Also it doesn’t smell that bad.
customer_reviews.author: S. WELCH

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed product delivered
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived Undamaged. However, Not sure how to feel about the product as the bottle arrived with no seal on the outside or inside. I’m not sure if it was opened prior to delivery, used before, watered down, or some arbitrary liquid is inside the bottle because there was no seal.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Star

customer_reviews.title: A fair price!
customer_reviews.text: I am going to clean my tub and tile before I grout, so I hope that it works. I think that the quality will not be an issue! Prompt, careful Shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Deeds

customer_reviews.title: Pure Acetone
customer_reviews.text: Only used a little trying to smooth plastic from 3D printed parts. Need to find out more about the process. Someone said this could work but I haven’t had a lot of success. I’m sure this is the real thing and don’t fault the product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail polish remover! I removed my polish in no time at all and my fingers were so soft afterwards. I would recommend this product to anyone who loves to paint their nails at home on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR GEL NAIL POLISH
customer_reviews.text: This is the best to take out gel nail polish I put some in a bowl and then just let my fingers in there and it takes off the polish. this is my second time buying this
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for removal of super glue
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty fast on most small amount of said substances for removal of thick glue best to let it soak in it, if that is not possible just keep replying it to said surface.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Estevez

customer_reviews.title: Not pure acetone
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use this acetone to clean chemical residue off our equipment. Left a worse residue. NOT PURE
customer_reviews.author: A. Priest

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: It's pure acetone! We used it to remove paint off if jars we purchased. It works great and doesn't smell any stronger then normal acetone.
customer_reviews.author: N.J.B

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: soaked nails for a full day and still wouldn't come off
customer_reviews.author: taykeishalilly

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for gel removal
customer_reviews.text: I use this to remove gel polish and to soak off gel and acrylic nails. Unfortunately it doesn’t do the best job at it. It doesn’t seem very strong, it doesn’t break down the product like others I’ve used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have when removing gel nail polish!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other brands of acetone before and haven’t had the best success... until i tried this brand! It works awesome!! I soak the cotton pads in the acetone, and then put them on the nail (after roughing the surface up a bit with a nail file) and wrap in tin foil for 10-15 mins and the gel nail polish literally peels up. It’s amazing! Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Gets polish off in 2 strokes Great for soaking off dip and gel Use lotion after though because it will dry out your skin when soaking
customer_reviews.author: Keira

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says it is: acetone
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely acetone. I like the small top. It mimics the size of your usual go-to nail polish remover. So if you're that type of person who sticks your finger in and tips it upside down, this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Acuna

customer_reviews.title: The best nail polish remover.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nail polish remover out there. I have been using it for years. It is professional grade. The packaging was great because it came wrapped in tight plastic so there were no spills in case of anything. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Raised the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back on April 6th and at that time I paid $7.50 for it it works ok but not that great for the price they are asking for it now!
customer_reviews.author: nancy rutledge

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE:  Not Pure Acetone!
customer_reviews.text: This is not pure Acetone. When you open it there is no smell. To took over an hour to get the gel off my nails. This product did not melt the gel polish. I feel like I was damaging my nails by forcing it off. It came off in chuncks that never melted when it was swimming in whatever this is. So upset it took me a month to use it? Doesn't even smell like nail polish remover. This is a scam!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acetone. That’s it.
customer_reviews.text: Big bottle for my significant other who needed to get her gel nails off. It seems to have worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jusburnin_dc5

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works for me... now that we don’t go to the nail salon anymore my daughter and I do our nails once or twice a month soaks our gel polish off just fine. Happy will consider purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Came on time and is a super good value! This bottle will last me a long time! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Bottle Not Full
customer_reviews.text: I'd have liked this better if 2oz of the acetone wasn't missing from the bottle. Luckily I just spoke with a nice CS rep named Suhaib who refunded my money. This company needs to deal the bottle with plastic before putting caps on because this is apparently a common issue.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R.

customer_reviews.title: NOT PURE ACETONE. NOT.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT PURE ACETONE. WILL NOT REMOVE YOUR ACRYLIC NAILS AT ALL. DO NOT SPEND YOUR MONEY UNLESS YOU WANT IT FOR REGULAR REMOVAL OF NAIL POLISH.
customer_reviews.author: Max G

customer_reviews.title: The size is great and work!
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I put it on a cotton ball and let it sit on my nails or toes for about a minute and it comes off completely. It works and it’s a good size bottle for good price.
customer_reviews.author: Destini Silver

customer_reviews.title: What's in YOUR bottle of actone
customer_reviews.text: The product seened to be watered down. A 20 min soak on dip nail color barely made a dent in the dip nail color.
customer_reviews.author: P. B. SMITH

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This stuff removes polish like a charm. I normally use a base coat, 2 coats of polish, a coat of sparkles, & finish with a top coat for a total of 5 layers of polish. This stuff has no problem removing it. I use this with cotton balls.
customer_reviews.author: Shanster84

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Takes off my dip nails very well! Worked better than other acetone I’ve used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: By gosh THIS will remove any polish in a jiffy ...
customer_reviews.text: By gosh THIS will remove any polish in a jiffy. ( wouldn't use on delicate nails) Some of the polish remover today just will not do the job without a lot of work, but THIS will.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fast working
customer_reviews.text: Been using this brand for years and works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Elon S

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very potent and efficient nail polish remover. Definitely recommend for the casual at home manicure and pedicure or for any business owner that needs a strong agent in order to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! :)
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product wonderful price! Great at getting the job done :) Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I was able to get off the powder dip that acetone from the store couldn't remove.
customer_reviews.author: Celena

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Seems to not be pure, but it still works just takes a little longer to work.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Fields

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for removing my dip power nail sets. Upon arrival, the cap was loose inside the package and the plastic it was wrapped in was a little wet, but I didn't lose much product.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: For my work
customer_reviews.text: I use it not for my nails but for my work. When I polish or clean gemstones, I use acetone. Tt cleans very well and fast!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Alice

customer_reviews.title: Acetone
customer_reviews.text: Woud be so much easier to use with a flip-top cap but product is perfect. Scent is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! However, they sell the same exactly acetone brand in beauty supply stores for 4 bucks. I wish i would've known this much sooner..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great remover for soak of gel polish
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I decided to give it a try after continually struggling to get "soak off" gel polish removed. It works faster than any other I have tried. I think the added ingredients in acetone polish removers keep it from being effective. This one I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MummQ307

customer_reviews.title: Gel polish remover
customer_reviews.text: This stuff removes gel polish so well. I'd say its medium size compared to normal nail polish bottles you see at stores. You dont need a lot which is nice. I use this like crazy and still have plenty in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Received the item quicker then expected and its just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: If you have gel polish on you NEED to wrap it in aluminum foil no matter what, honestly I've needed to use my dermal sander to get polish off after soaking it wrapped in cotton for over a hr. Not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney fix

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bottle came wrapped in bubble wrap intact, on time and product was great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Scholz

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Did not get my nail polish off. Missed cutoff to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Pardue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. They even taped the top for shipping so it didn't spill!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Close top tightly after use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pour container. I use this product to thin plastic wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Product as described. Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Karina K.

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do - Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It took me less time to soak off acrylic and wonderful for clean up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
